name: n8n-whatsapp-bot
description: WhatsApp Bot with n8n, DeepSeek AI Agent, and Google Calendar integration
author: Kike

scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.dev:fresh: docker compose down --volumes --remove-orphans && docker compose up -d --build
scripts.clean: docker compose down --volumes --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.clean:data: docker compose down --volumes --remove-orphans && sudo rm -rf ./data/postgres ./data/n8n && docker system prune -f
scripts.fresh:clean: npm run clean:data && docker compose up -d --build
scripts.backup:db: docker exec postgres_db pg_dumpall -U admin > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.db:connect: docker exec -it postgres_db psql -U admin -d postgres
